channel.title: Plasma Desktop Shell - The KDE Crash
channel.description:
Hi, long time Whonix user here, never had any issue with it until now. Gateway is starting and running fine but the workstation is crashing since yesterday every god damn time. I did nothing, yesterday everything was working great, and suddenly out of the blue KDE is crashing on the startup and I can't access my desktop and all of my files.
This is the error message:
Executable: plasma-desktop PID: 6808 Signal: Bus error (7)
How can I fix this?

item.title: Plasma Desktop Shell - The KDE Crash
item.dc:creator: entr0py
item.description:
Doubtful that Whonix is causing the crash - haven’t experienced or heard of similar reports.

Try searching (since PID is random): “plasma-desktop bus error 7”. Some promising hits.
